    Sunway College Vacancies Manager/ Senior Manager - Projects & Operations (Schools & Pre-U Studies)

    November 27, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Sunway College is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Manager/ Senior Manager - Projects & Operations (Schools & Pre-U Studies) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    The incumbent shall work closely with Executive Director of Sunway International School and Director of Pre-University Studies in all operation and project matters of Sunway's international school (SIS) campuses and Pre-university (Pre-U) programmes to ensure efficient processes and services that meet stakeholders' needs and expectations. Roles and responsibilities include, but are not limited to, the following:
    a. Operations:
    • manage allocation and utilisation of resources for effetive delivery of programmes and services; this includes planning, budgeting, and resourcing for growth of schools/campuses and Pre-U programmes
    • manage quality assurance processes, benchmark best practices, and promote continuous improvement plans in collaboration with principals of schools/campuses, directors of Pre-U programmes, internal support departments, and external parties
    • assist ED/DPUS to develop, implement, and review action plans and SOPs for school/college campuses and Pre-U programmes; this includes ensuring regulatory compliance with MOE/MOHE and MQA and quality rating frameworks like SKIPS, MyQuest, and etcetera
    • work with relevant departments, agencies, and vendors for smooth running of school/college and programme related events like Open days, Orientation/Induction programmes, Co-curricular activities, and Graduation/Award ceremonies; this can comprise ad-hoc events that arise from time to time
    • manage and improve school/college/programme's knowledge repository systems according to academic and administration needs; to work with IT, communication, and relevant departments on secure storage, retrieval, management, and dissemination of information
    b. Projects:
    • perform project management responsibilities as required; this inlcudes documentation and supervision as relate development of new campuses and programmes
    • monitor and evaluate efficacy of existing and new projects, implement plans to ensure quality and timely completion, and report to management on project outcomes
    c. General:
    • develop and maintain effective lines of communication with internal and external stakeholders including regulatory bodies and corporate partners
    • serve as management representative and/or secretary in committees working on business strategies, resource and project planning, implementation and continuous improvement
    • conduct projects/duties as assigned by management 

    Attributes
    This position is suitable for someone with:
    • ability to multitask and manage different stakeholder priorities
    • good command of the English and Malay languages 
    • strong interpersonal and communication skills
    • attention to details and problem solving skills 
    We thank all applicants for expressing their interest in this vacancy. Please note that only shortlisted applicants will be notified.

    Company Overview

    A subsidiary of the Sunway Education Group which is owned and governed by the Jeffrey Cheah Foundation, Sunway College currently offers internationally recognised pre-university, Australian twinning degree and MBA programmes as well as professional accounting programmes.
    In view of the overwhelming response and consistently high enrolment of students into our pre-university programmes, we are now seeking expressions of interest and applications from suitably qualified, dynamic and self-driven candidates who can effectively contribute to the advancement of our tradition of excellence.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
